name: Relic Remastered
description:
Welcome one and all! 

Relic Remastered is a short adventure game featuring all that fantasy good stuff like adventuring, exploration, weapons, story and secrets! 

This was the first large project I did, and will be the submission for the game jam "Going for old", as the third level has had most (if not all) of its enviromental assets replaced.

The original content for this was never published, nor was the game itself, so feel free to get stuck in.

The game is set before my previously released title "ReRelic" and aims to add detail to the world.

Mango
